dict.acceptation: 角落，角；拐角；困境；[商]囤积；

sent.orig: Corner can be divided into dead corner with live corner.
sent.trans: 折角又可不合为活折角与活折角两栽。

sent.orig: A WONDERFUL corner for echoes, it has been remarked, that corner where the Doctor lived.
sent.trans: 前面说过，医生居住的街角是个听回音的绝妙处所。

sent.orig: Loss of East corner, a corner of the West.
In the race Buddha is in the red corner and Aristotle is in the blue corner.
sent.trans: 在这场竞赛中，东方文化和西方文化针锋相对、不相上下。

sent.orig: Now, fold my corner to your corner.
sent.trans: 现在，把我的角与你的角对折。
